name: GithubCreateIssueComment
description:
Create a comment on a GitHub issue.

Use this tool to add a comment to a specific issue in a GitHub repository. Ensure you manage content creation speed to avoid secondary rate limiting.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. Not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository where the issue is located. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: issue_identifier
parameters.description: The unique number identifying the GitHub issue.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the issue.

parameters.name: comment_content
parameters.description: The text content of the comment to be added to the issue.
